text: , also called , was a bureaucrat in the Ryukyu Kingdom."Oroku Ryōchū". Okinawa konpakuto jiten (沖縄コンパクト事典, "Okinawa Compact Encyclopedia"). Ryōchū was born in the aristocrat family called Ba-uji Oroku Dunchi (). His father was Oroku Ryōkyō. Oroku Ryōkyō was a a Sanshikan during Shō Iku's reign. Oroku Ryōchū became part of the Sanshikan in 1857. ==References== Category:1819 births Category:19th-century Ryukyuan people Category:Year of death missing
title: Oroku Ryōchū
